claimAIO(string,uint256).details: User must have completed an interaction with this action and timestamp.      Each interaction can only be claimed once. Protected by nonReentrant.

params.action: Action string identifier (must match the original interaction)
params.timestamp: Block timestamp of the original interaction (from InteractionRecorded event)

params.owner_: Address that will own the contract

enableGovernanceMode(address,address).details: Only callable once by owner or trustedBootstrapper. After enabling, owner renounces control to Safe multisig.

params.admin: Safe multisig address (will receive DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE and ownership)
params.paramSetter: Address that can set parameters (will receive PARAM_SETTER_ROLE)

params.timestamp: Block timestamp of the original interaction

returns.claimed: Whether the interaction has been claimed
returns.rewardAmount: The reward amount for this action (0 if not configured)

returns.feeWei_: The minimum ETH fee in wei

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event.

interact(string,bytes).details: Requires msg.value >= feeWei(). Forwards ETH to FeeDistributor.      Protected by nonReentrant to prevent reentrancy attacks.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

setAIORewardPool(address).details: Only callable by owner or PARAM_SETTER_ROLE (if governance mode enabled)

params.rewardPool_: Address of the reward pool (must have AIO tokens and approve Interaction contract)

setAIOToken(address).details: Only callable by owner or PARAM_SETTER_ROLE (if governance mode enabled)

params.aioToken_: Address of the AIO token contract

setActionAllowlist(bytes32,bool).details: Only callable by owner or PARAM_SETTER_ROLE (if governance mode enabled). Action should be hashed before calling.

params.allowed: Whether the action should be allowed

setActionAllowlistByString(string,bool).details: Only callable by owner or PARAM_SETTER_ROLE (if governance mode enabled)

params.allowed: Whether the action should be allowed

setActionReward(bytes32,uint256).details: Only callable by owner or PARAM_SETTER_ROLE (if governance mode enabled)

params.rewardAmount: Reward amount in wei (0 to disable rewards for this action)

setActionRewardByString(string,uint256).details: Only callable by owner or PARAM_SETTER_ROLE (if governance mode enabled)

params.rewardAmount: Reward amount in wei (0 to disable rewards for this action)

setAllowlistEnabled(bool).details: Only callable by owner or PARAM_SETTER_ROLE (if governance mode enabled)

setTrustedBootstrapper(address).details: Only callable by owner before governance mode is enabled

params.bootstrapper: Address of the trusted bootstrapper contract

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

actionAllowlist(bytes32).notice: Mapping from action hash to allowlist status

actionReward(bytes32).notice: Mapping from action hash to AIO reward amount (in wei)

aioRewardPool().notice: AIO reward pool address (where AIO tokens are stored for distribution)

allowlistEnabled().notice: Flag to enable/disable action allowlist feature

claimAIO(string,uint256).notice: Claims AIO tokens for a completed interaction

claimedInteractions(address,bytes32,uint.notice: Mapping to track claimed interactions: user => actionHash => timestamp => claimed

enableGovernanceMode(address,address).notice: Enables governance mode with Safe multisig and parameter setter role

getClaimStatus(address,string,uint256).notice: Checks if a user has claimed AIO for a specific interaction

interact(string,bytes).notice: Records an interaction with ETH fee payment

setAIORewardPool(address).notice: Sets the AIO reward pool address

setAIOToken(address).notice: Sets the AIO token contract address

setActionAllowlist(bytes32,bool).notice: Adds or removes an action from the allowlist

setActionAllowlistByString(string,bool).notice: Convenience function to set action allowlist by string

setActionReward(bytes32,uint256).notice: Sets the AIO reward amount for an action

setActionRewardByString(string,uint256).notice: Convenience function to set action reward by string

setAllowlistEnabled(bool).notice: Enables or disables the action allowlist feature

trustedBootstrapper().notice: Optional trusted bootstrapper address that can call enableGovernanceMode
